message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for sale at $170. I believe it will be highly valuable for you.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product, but my budget allows me to pay no more than $100 for it. Would you consider lowering the price?
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $100 is too low for me.  Could you do $150?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. While $150 is closer to my budget, I still can't go above $100. Would you be able to meet me at this price point?
